objective: learn more about restoration magic from the Augur
first_tasks: talk with the Augur, who's expecting you

quest_giver.name: Colette Marence
quest_giver.description: a fellow member of the College of Winterhold

reward.description: the player will learn more about restoration

characters.name: Augur
characters.description: a powerful male mage gifted in restoration

tools: the player is a devoted student of restoration: most mages of the College of Winterhold look down on restoration magic
description:
Look at you. Such a devoted student of Restoration. It's comforting to see that not everyone has dismissed it as entirely as most members of the College. Truly comforting.
It looks like you're ready to speak with the Augur. He was a brilliant mage. Truly inspired. Mastered spells others could barely comprehend. He was especially gifted when it came to Restoration.
The Augur's... Well, he's very particular about who shares the knowledge. So you'll need his approval first. Go on, go talk to him. I'm sure he's been paying attention, and will be expecting you.

name: A Night to Remember
objective: find Sam as you recover from a bad hangover
first_tasks: clean up the mess that you made, and apologize to Senna

characters.name: Dibella
characters.description: the goddess of love and compassion

tools: Senna wakes the player up: the player does not remember anything about coming to the Temple of Dibella, blathering about marriage or a goat, and throwing trash all over the Temple of Dibella
description:
Wake up! That's right, it's time to wake up, you drunken blasphemer!
Of course! You don't remember getting here. I'm guessing you also don't remember coming in here and blathering incoherently about marriage or a goat. Which means you don't remember losing your temper and throwing trash all over the temple.
You want to know where your friend Sam has gone? Dibella teaches love and compassion, but that doesn't mean we're just going to tell you what you want to know and let you walk away from this. Pick up your mess, then apologize, and if we think you're sincere we'll consider lending you aid.

name: Fetch the Netch
objective: obtain five samples of Netch jelly for Milore Ienth
first_tasks: find Netch
tools: NONE
description:
I'm proud to say that I grow or harvest most of my exotic ingredients myself.
I only wish I had a better source for Netch jelly. Those creatures are difficult to track down since it's so dangerous beyond the the town walls.
Could you gather some Netch jelly for me? That would be splendid! Five samples should be enough. I'd be more than happy to give you something for the effort.

name: Extracting an Argonian
objective: rescue Derkeethus
first_tasks: find Derkeethus

first_task_locations.name: Darkwater Pass
first_task_locations.description: a dangerous cave filled with water pools and high falls, south of Darkwater Crossing

tools: NONE
description:
There's a cave known as the Darkwater Pass south of here. It has its share of water pools and high falls.
Those falls... dangerous place. A friend of mine, Derkeethus, thought he could find some good fish in the pools. Haven't heard from him in a long while.
Could you try to find him? He might need someone to rescue him.

name: Clean Sweep
objective: cleanse the Ancestral Tomb
first_tasks: kill the ash spawn that defile the Ancestral Tomb

first_task_locations.description: an Ancestral Tomb beneath the Temple

locations.name: Ancestral Tombs
locations.description: tombs where dark elves inter their dead

tools: Elder Othreloth gives the player a key that opens the door to the Ancestral Tomb
description:
The Ancestral Tombs are where we inter our dead. They are sacred places, meant to honor their passing. Sadly, we've been unable to use the Ancestral Tomb beneath the Temple as of late, and have resorted to other locations to scatter the remains.
Those foul vermin... the abominations we call ash spawn have risen from the ashes of our own ancestors. They're befouling the memories of our forefathers by defiling their remains.
Could you cleanse the tomb for us, wanderer? That would be most kind. Here, this key should open the door to the tomb.

name: The Only Cure
objective: kill Orchendor, and return to Peryite
first_tasks: find Orchendor

quest_giver.name: Peryite
quest_giver.description: the god of infection and pestilence

reward.description: a powerful token: a dwarven-made escutcheon, capable of shielding the player from both the spell and sword

groups.name: Afflicted
groups.description: people from Breton villages who were infected with Peryite's plague

tools: Orchendor was sent to gather Afflicted to Bthardamz: Orchendor betrayed Peryite afterwards
description:
I have watched you for some time, you know. The decisions you've made intrigue me, and I wonder if you are the proper agent for a task of mine.
I sent a blessing to the world, a wasting plague that infected a scattering of Breton villages. One of my monks, the elf Orchendor, was sent to gather these Afflicted. He shepherded them into Bthardamz for me, but has since lost his way.
I will not stand for betrayal. I want you to go to Bthardamz and kill Orchendor, in my name. I can grant you a powerful token for this task. An escutcheon of dwarven make, capable of shielding you from both the spell and sword. Return when the elf lies dead and it will be yours.

name: Bow to the Master
objective: retrieve Dravin Llanith's stolen bow
first_tasks: find the thieves who stole Dravin Llanith's bow

reward.description: Dravin Llanith will pay the player what he can

tools: NONE
description:
A few days ago, some thieves from Riften broke in here and stole it! Can you imagine? Took the only thing of value we had. It was a family heirloom. I can't even put a price on how much that thing means to me.
I'm sure that they are from Riften. I bumped into them when I was coming back to my farm after buying supplies. I know those lowlifes took it with them back to the Ratway. They left an unmistakable stench behind.
If you have the guts to head into the Ratway and get my bow back, I'll pay you what I can. It would be nice to have it back... means a lot to me.

name: Brelyna's Practice
objective: help Brelyna Maryon by allowing her to practice her spells on you
first_tasks: stand where you are
tools: NONE
description:
We're all trying to become better mages, right?
Well, I need someone I can practice a few spells on. Nothing dangerous, really.
Would you be willing to assist me? I can't practice that kind of spell on myself. Believe me when I say I wouldn't be asking if it weren't necessary. You just have to stand there...
You might wish to help out one of your fellow mages. If that is not enough, I have this amulet you could take.

name: Begging for Death
objective: assassinate Narfi
first_tasks: find Narfi

quest_giver.name: Nazir
quest_giver.description: a fellow assassin who does not like the player very much

tools: NONE
description:
Go assassinate Narfi. He's a hapless beggar living in some ruins just outside the village of Ivarstead. Easy even for you.
You get to slaughter an emaciated beggar in cold blood. You are truly an opponent to be feared. I'll have your payment waiting for you.

name: Unearthed
objective: become Ralis Sedarys' business partner in his search for the Relics of Ahzidal in Kolbjorn Barrow
first_tasks: give 1,000 gold to Ralis Sedarys so that he can hire some diggers from Raven Rock to dig up Kolbjorn Barrow

reward.description: once there is something worth looking at, Ralis Sedarys sends word to the player

locations.name: Kolbjorn Barrow
locations.description: an ancient tomb buried in ash in the northern ashlands of Solstheim

locations.name: Mournhold
locations.description: a large city on the mainland

tools: the ash storms fill up Kolbjorn Barrow faster than Ralis Sedarys can dig
description:
The name's Ralis. Ralis Sedarys, out of Mournhold.
I've got a financier waiting for me back on the mainland. Sent me here in the interests of obtaining some rare antiquities. The 'Relics of Ahzidal.' But this whole thing became a disaster right quick, let me tell you.
You come out to the northern ashlands, you don't expect things to go easy, you know? But this was something outside my particular expertise. When I first got to Kolbjorn, you couldn't even see it. Buried in the ash, like most other things on this blasted island. Dug out a pile of the stuff taller than me just to find the barrow. Who knows how much to reach the door. Excavating isn't exactly my specialty. Even if it was, the ash storms fill it in faster than you can dig.
Could you become my business partner? We can sort out the details of our little arrangement later, but for now, I'll manage the dig if you can manage the coin.
When you have 1,000 gold for me, I'll head back to Raven Rock and round up some diggers. Once we've got something worth looking at, I'll send word to you.

name: Scoundrel's Folly
objective: squeeze Gulum-Ei for information
first_tasks: find Gulum-Ei

quest_giver.name: Mercer Frey
quest_giver.description: the player's guildleader in the Thieves Guild

characters.name: Gulum-Ei
characters.description: a male Thieves Guild informant within the East Empire Company

characters.name: Brynjolf
characters.description: a male member of the Thieves Guild

locations.name: Goldenglow Estate
locations.description: an estate that used to send protection money to the Thieves Guild

tools: Gulum-Ei acted as a go-between for the sale of Goldenglow Estate: he can finger the buyer
the player should talk to Brynjolf before they leave if they have any questions
description:
Ah, there you are. I have a job for you.
Gulum-Ei is our inside man at the East Empire Company in Solitude. I'm betting he acted as a go-between for the sale of Goldenglow Estate and that he can finger our buyer.
Get out there, shake him down and see what you come up with. Talk to Brynjolf before you leave if you have any questions.

name: A Jarl's Justice
objective: kill a vampire masquerading as a visiting advisor in Brunwulf Free-Winter's court
first_tasks: convince Brunwulf Free-Winter that the visiting advisor is a threat to him

quest_giver.name: Isran
quest_giver.description: the player's leader in the Dawnguard

characters.name: Brunwulf Free-Winter
characters.description: a Jarl holding his court in Windhelm

tools: Brunwulf Free-Winter's guards are unaware of the threat, and will treat violence against the visiting advisor as a crime
description:
Jarl Brunwulf Free-Winter is in danger. A vampire plays as a visiting "advisor" to the court of Windhelm. Destroy it before it's able to complete its foul business.
But be warned. The Jarl's guards are unaware of the threat, and will treat violence against this "advisor" as a crime. Convince the Jarl of the threat and he'll let you destroy the creature. If not, then do your best not to get caught.
Quickly now! The longer you delay, the more danger the Jarl is in.

name: Ancestral Worship
objective: help Golldir save Agna, and stop Vals Veran from defiling Hillgrund's Tomb
first_tasks: meet Golldir inside Hillgrund's Tomb, and go after Vals Veran with Golldir

quest_giver.name: Golldir
quest_giver.description: a man who is afraid of Hillgrund's Tomb

characters.name: Vals Veran
characters.description: a dark elf necromancer who has never seen eye to eye with Golldir's family

tools: NONE
description:
Can you help me? There's a necromancer in the tomb; doing Gods know what with my dead relatives.
The necromancer's called Vals Veran. My family has never really seen eye to eye with him and he has finally gone off the deep end. He's gone in to defile our family tomb by using our ancestors for his filthy dark elf necromancy.
My aunt went in after him, but she hasn't come out yet and I'm afraid to go in by myself. I'm not proud of it. I'm terrified of that place and Aunt Agna knows it. My Da locked me in there in a drunken rage when he left us... three days in there eating the offerings left for our dead before Aunt Agna found me.
I'll unlock the door and meet you inside, then you can lead the way. We should get after Vals Veran before he does more damage here.

name: For the Good of Morthal
objective: help Gorm to address his worries about Idgrod's leadership
first_tasks: deliver Gorm's letter to Captain Aldis

characters.name: Idgrod
characters.description: the noblewoman who rules over Morthal, and a seer

tools: Idgrod gets lost in her visions
description:
My mind weighs heavy enough. Idgrod's so lost in her visions, and it's only getting worse. I've looked after her safety for so long... If she can't tell what's real and what's not, how will she continue to lead Morthal?
There is a letter, one I have had for some time now. I think it is time it gets delivered. I cannot leave Idgrod's side, so I must stay here. Could you see that it reaches Captain Aldis in Solitude?
Please, do not open it. It is... private.

name: Dragonhide
objective: help Tolfdir finish his research on the Dragonhide
first_tasks: retrieve Kahvozein's Fang, and use it to carve a few heartscales off a dead dragon

reward.description: the first copy of the Dragonhide tome

items.name: Dragonhide
items.description: a protection spell, an improvement on the Ebonyflesh spell

tools: NONE
description:
I've been working on something. An improvement on the Ebonyflesh spell. I've made progress, but then hit a snag. I think perhaps you could help.
I made some progress using the essence of dragon scales. But they're just not quite potent enough. My knowledge of history is far from complete, but I did some research and discovered two things.
First, there are ancient references to dragon "heartscales". What little I could learn suggests they may be what I need. Second, there are stories of a dagger called Kahvozein's Fang, said to be sharp enough to carve heartscales off a dragon.
First you'll need to retrieve the dagger, then use it to carve a few heartscales off a dragon. Presumably a deceased one.
If my research succeeds, I certainly think you deserve the first copy of the Dragonhide spell tome.

name: First Edition
objective: locate a Folio for Cindiri Arano
first_tasks: find the Folio

first_task_locations.name: Strident Squall
first_task_locations.description: a ship that sank off the coast of Solstheim, and turned into a reaver den

locations.name: First Edition
locations.description: a famous bookshop far away from Solstheim

tools: Cindiri Arano sent the Folio to the First Edition to be rebound: they sent it back on the Strident Squall
description:
A few months ago, I had sent an important Folio to the First Edition to be rebound. They sent it back to me recently, but it never arrived.
The Folio was aboard the "Strident Squall" or something like that. The damn thing sunk right off the coast of Solstheim. Can you imagine? One of the sailors survived. Poor thing crawled all the way to Raven Rock on his hands and knees. Before he died, he told the guard about the wreck and warned us that it was going to be crawling with reavers.
Could you find the Folio for me? You have no idea how much it hurts losing such a precious item!

name: A Fair Wage
objective: convince Torbjorn Shatter-Shield pay his Argonian dockhands fairly
first_tasks: talk to Torbjorn Shatter-Shield

characters.name: Torbjorn Shatter-Shield
characters.description: a cheapskate Nord male business owner

tools: NONE
description:
Torbjorn Shatter-Shield is giving me trouble. I wish someone would beat the coin out of his fat fists. He clings to every coin.
He says an Argonian's labor is only worth a tenth of a "proper Nord worker." My people are not slaves! You can try talking with him, but we've gotten nowhere talking to him ourselves.

name: Forgotten Books
objective: bring ancient Falmer tomes to Urag gro-Shub
first_tasks: find more ancient Falmer tomes

reward.description: a translated edition of each brought Falmer tome

tools: the player is presenting an ancient Falmer tome to Urag gro-Shub and asking if Urag gro-Shub is interested in buying it
description:
Well, well. I haven't seen one of these beauties in a long time. A rare find in the original Falmer language. You're damn right I'm interested. Question is, are you selling?
Well, considering no one else in Skyrim would buy something they couldn't possibly read, I'd say you don't have much of a choice. Tell you what, you bring me books like this, and I'll pay a thousand gold each. I'll even throw in a translated edition I have for free.
If you're holding out for more gold, it's never going to happen.

name: Grin and Bear It
objective: bring 10 bear pelts to Temba Wide-Arm
first_tasks: get 10 bear pelts by killing bears

reward.description: Temba Wide-Arm will pay the player

tools: NONE
description:
Have you ever seen what a bear does to the trees? They jump up on their hind legs and scratch them to bits... marking their territory or something.
It's getting to the point where I have to scour Skyrim for untouched trees at the right size. Costs me too much time and money.
Tell you what. Bring me ten of bear pelts from anywhere in Skyrim I'll gladly pay you for thinning out the herd.

name: A New Book to Read
objective: deliver "Olaf and the Dragon" to Giruad Gemane
first_tasks: find Giruad Gemane and ask for a tip

items.name: "Olaf and the Dragon"
items.description: a new book written by Adonato Leotelli

tools: NONE
description:
I write drama, friend. The legends and history of the world made to excite and inspire.
Poor Giruad Gemane at the Bards College has been waiting for my latest work, "Olaf and the Dragon," for weeks now. Roads are a mess.
You'll deliver the book for me? You're sure? When you see Giruad, ask for a tip. I'm sure he'll be in a good mood after reading this.

name: Dragon Hunting
objective: kill a dragon with the Blades
first_tasks: ask Esbern to send the Blades to the dragon

characters.name: Dragonborn
characters.description: the only person who can defeat dragons for good

tools: the player is Dragonborn
description:
The Blades of the old hunted down many dragons in their day, and they have records of where the beasts lived.
Only you can truly defeat these monsters, Dragonborn, but you do not have to do so alone. The Blades can help you.
Just ask whenever you're ready to take on a dragon. We will send the Blades to help you fulfill your destiny. The dragon's soul should make you stronger.

name: The Cursed Tribe
objective: Help lift the curse placed on Yamarz
first_tasks: bring Troll Fat and a Daedra Heart to Atub

quest_giver.name: Atub
quest_giver.description: the wisewoman of the orc clan

characters.name: Yamarz
characters.description: the male chief of the orc clan, who was a strong and proud warrior

tools: Yamarz became weak: the giants sense Yamarz's weakness, and intrude on the orc clan's territory
Atub must petition Malacath for relief: the ritual must be done at the walled orc camp
description:
Please, our tribe suffers and we need help.
Our Chief, Yamarz, was once a strong and proud warrior. Now he is stricken, cursed. He is weak, and so our tribe is weak. The giants sense this, and intrude on our territory. Now they assault our very home.
Yamarz refuses help, but I sense that you may be just what we need. He has demanded we stay inside the walls. We cannot leave. I must petition Malacath for relief. This curse must be lifted. But I cannot travel to Malacath's shrine. The ritual must be done here, and I do not have the materials I need.
I beg of you, can you bring me Troll Fat and a Daedra Heart? I have no wish to depend on a stranger, but I have no choice.

name: Culling the Beast
objective: kill thin-blooded vampires
first_tasks: find the thin-blooded vampires
tools: NONE
description:
A bunch of feral vampires are running wild, upsetting the mortals. When the prey is riled, it makes things difficult for us.
Go cull the brutish beasts in Haemar's Shame before the problem gets out of hand. At first you may pity the thin-bloods. But after disposing of a few, you realize they aren't worth the worry.

name: At the Summit of Miraak's Defeat
objective: destroy Miraak and lift his master's shadow from the land
first_tasks: kill Miraak

quest_giver.name: Frea
quest_giver.description: a woman whose father sacrificed himself for the player

tools: NONE
description:
Go. My father sacrificed himself so that you could destroy Miraak and lift his master's shadow from the land.
Go, then. Kill Miraak. Do not fail.

name: Swim for Your Life
objective: assassinate Deekus
first_tasks: locate Deekus

first_task_locations.name: Hela's Folly
first_task_locations.description: a small waterlogged shipwreck northeast of Dawnstar

characters.name: Deekus
characters.description: a male Argonian layabout, and a shipwreck scavenger

tools: Argonians are unpredictable opponents, especially near water
description:
There's an assassination contract for you. You are to kill Deekus.
He is an Argonian layabout, likes to scavenge shipwrecks. My guess is he'll run if threatened. Or swim, if given the chance.
Personally, I've always found Argonians to be incredibly unpredictable opponents. Especially near water. Unfortunately, Deekus is at Hela's Folly, a small waterlogged shipwreck northeast of Dawnstar. Making him stay out of water will be difficult.

name: Meet the Family
objective: speak with some fellow members of the Thieves Guild and pick up your new armor
first_tasks: talk with Delvin Mallory and Vex and Tonilia for your armor

quest_giver.name: Brynjolf
quest_giver.description: the player's superior in the Thieves Guild

locations.name: The Ragged Flagon
locations.description: a bar that is actually a front to the Thieves Guild

characters.name: Delvin Mallory, Vex
characters.description: fellow members of the Thieves Guild who can give the player extra jobs

characters.name: Tonilia
characters.description: a female member of the Thieves Guild

tools: the player just joined the Thieves Guild: the player should do as they're told and keep their blade clean to get their share of the loot
description:
Welcome to the family, kid. I'm expecting you to make us a lot of coin, so don't disappoint me.
This is how you get your cut of the spoils. Do as you're told and keep your blade clean. We can't turn a profit by killing.
You should talk with Delvin Mallory and Vex. They know their way around this place and they'll be able to kick some extra jobs your way.
Oh, and talk to Tonilia in the Flagon... she'll set you up with your new armor.

name: Proven Paranoia
objective: assassinate Ennodius Papius
first_tasks: find Ennodius Papius

first_task_locations.description: in the woods near Anga's Mill

characters.name: Ennodius Papius
characters.location: in the woods near Anga's Mill

tools: NONE
description:
Ennodius Papius lives just outside Anga's Mill, in the woods. He was once the miller. Now Papius is just a paranoid recluse who thinks someone is out to get him. And he's right.
You will assassinate him and prove his paranoia legitimate.

name: The Lover's Requital
objective: help Sibbi Black-Briar in his plans to kill Svidi
first_tasks: find Svidi

quest_giver.name: Sibbi Black-Briar
quest_giver.description: a pompous, womanizing nobleman, one of the Black-Briars

characters.name: Svidi
characters.description: a buxom young woman with long flowing black hair and beautiful singing voice, Sibbi Black-Briar's former fiancée

tools: Svidi found out that Sibbi Black-Briar had an affair and told Wulfur about it
Wulfur attacked Sibbi Black-Briar: Sibbi Black-Briar killed Wulfur and was arrested for Wulfur's murder
Sibbi Black-Briar has to stay in jail for 8 months
description:
Look, we all have our flaws; mine is that women can't get enough of me. So I had this little affair going on while I was betrothed to a beautiful girl named Svidi. Well, she finds out and she tells her brother, Wulfur. Then her brother attacks me with a knife... I mean, I had to defend myself!
So I got arrested for his murder. And now I have to stare at these bars for eight months. Can you believe it? I was about to let that wench Svidi marry into the richest family in Riften, and this is how she repays me. I'd do anything to have that whore's head on a platter. All I need to know is where she is.
Find her and I promise you'll be well compensated. Svidi was a young woman... buxom, with long flowing black hair. She used to sing the most lovely songs to me when we were courting. I've never heard a voice so beautiful.
All that talent will go to waste when I'm finished with her.

name: Bullying Braith
objective: convince Braith to stop bullying Lars Battle-Born
first_tasks: talk to Braith

quest_giver.name: Lars Battle-Born
quest_giver.description: a young boy who can't fight

reward.description: the player will be Lars Battle-Born' best friend forever

tools: NONE
description:
I'm having trouble. Braith bullies me all the time. All the elders think I'm a milk drinker 'cause I can't fight. Nobody understands.
If you can get Braith to leave me alone, I'll be your best friend... forever! I'll pay you, too! My whole life's savings - two septims!

name: Under New Management
objective: become the guild master of the Thieves Guild
first_tasks: meet the members of the Thieves Guild

first_task_locations.description: in the center of the cistern room

quest_giver.name: Brynjolf
quest_giver.description: a fellow member of the Thieves Guild, and the player's friend

reward.description: the player becomes the guild master of the Thieves Guild

tools: NONE
description:
Well, my friend... the time's come to make it official. It's time to become our Guild Master.
Don't worry, I promise this will be short and sweet. If you'll just meet us in the center of the cistern room, we can begin.

name: Out of Balance
objective: remove pollution from the various points of focus for magic energies with specially enchanted gloves, and return the gloves to Drevis Neloren afterwards
first_tasks: find the focus points for magical energy
tools: the College of Winterhold has gone to great lengths to purify and enhance the natural energies of the world
description:
There may be a matter in which your... skills... could be useful. The various points of focus for magic energies around the College have become polluted, and need cleansing.
As you may be aware, the College has gone to great lengths to purify and enhance the natural energies of the world. This both enhances our connection to the realm of magic, and eliminates possible interference from outside sources. These energies, on occasion, become... polluted. Effort must be made to see that they are kept pure, clean.
These specially enchanted gloves will allow you to delve directly into the focal points for these energies. Go to each focal point and remove whatever impurities you may find there. Return the gloves to me when you have finished. Please exercise caution. This is not a procedure without possible... consequences.

name: Thorough Cleaning
objective: purify a soul gem
first_tasks: place the soul gem in 3 Dwarven Convectors and heat them for 3 seconds with Arniel Gane's spell

quest_giver.name: Arniel Gane
quest_giver.description: a scholar fascinated by the Dwemer

items.name: Dwarven Convectors, Convectors
items.description: Dwemer machines that were used to purify gems

groups.name: Dwemer
groups.description: a lost race of people, masters of magic

tools: the Dwemer's greatest achievement has also been their greatest mystery: their instant, unexplainable disappearance
Arniel Gane tries to find out what happened to the Dwemer though experimentation
the player brought Arniel Gane Dwemer parts and a soul gem before
description:
The Dwemer, they were uhh, masters of magic in a way we can't even begin to conceive of. Their greatest achievement, however, has also been their greatest, shall we say... mystery.
This mystery is their disappearance, of course! Instant, unexplainable. The stories have fascinated me... Ever since I was young, I wanted to know what really happened. After years and years of work, I'm closing in on a way to investigate what happened through experimentation.
Only now... Well, it's simply a disaster. Without boring you with the, ahh, details, I am attempting to re-create the circumstances of the event. I used the soul gem you brought me for this. The soul gem by itself isn't enough, you see. It needs to be altered, purified. The Dwemer had machines for this sort of thing. I attempted to build my own, based on designs and using parts you helped to provide. My very own Dwemer machine. It worked, but not fully. And the uhh... The device was destroyed in the process.
The designs for my Convector were based on real Dwemer machines, so there may still be some in existence. I'd go looking myself, but uhh... Yes, there are calculations to double- and triple-check. Many calculations. Perhaps you could seek out these Convectors in Skyrim ruins? I can even teach you the spell to heat them.
Just place the soul gem inside, and heat the Convector. At least three seconds. You'll almost certainly need to find multiple Convectors. I suspect it may be due to the nature of the soul gem versus the crystals this was intended for. Destroys the equipment in the process.
But, ahh... It's effective. Three times, and the crystal should be ready for the next step. Isn't this exciting?

name: The Gardener of Men
objective: bring the secrets of the Skaal to Hermaeus Mora
first_tasks: convince the Skaal to reveal their secrets

quest_giver.name: Hermaeus Mora, Gardener of Men
quest_giver.description: knower of the unknown, master of fates, an immortal god

reward.description: Hermaeus Mora will give the player what the player seeks

characters.name: Miraak
characters.description: the player's enemy, a man who sought out Hermaeus Mora's forbidden knowledge and received it

groups.name: Skaal
groups.description: a tribe of people who consider Hermaeus Mora a demon

tools: NONE
description:
I am Hermaeus Mora, the Gardener of Men, knower of the unknown, master of fates. You stand in my realm, mortal.
You have sought out the forbidden knowledge that only one other has obtained. You are a seeker of knowledge and power, like Miraak before you.
The Skaal have withheld their secrets from me for many long years. The time has come for this knowledge to be added to my library. Convince them to give up their secrets. My word is as true as fate, as inevitable as destiny. Bring me what I want, and I will give you what you seek.

name: Aftershock
objective: take care of a magical disturbance
first_tasks: contain the power from the Eye of Magnus with the Staff of Magnus

quest_giver.name: Tolfdir
quest_giver.description: a professor at the College of Winterhold

reward.description: a large portion of the reward from the Jarl of Markarth

items.name: Eye of Magnus
items.description: a powerful artifact that was held at the College of Winterhold

items.name: Staff of Magnus
items.description: a powerful staff that can contain energy from the Eye of Magnus

characters.name: Arch-Mage
characters.description: the leader of the College of Winterhold

characters.name: Jarl
characters.description: the nobleman who rules over Markarth

tools: the player is the Arch-Mage
the player should have the Staff of Magnus
description:
There is something you should be aware of, Arch-Mage. We've been contacted by the Jarl of Markarth. It would seem there's some sort of disturbance.
From what few details we were given, it sounds quite familiar. I suspect that the power released by the Eye of Magnus was not fully contained, and has coalesced in this part of Skyrim. I do hope you still have the Staff of Magnus someplace. I suspect you're going to need it to contain the power.
I'm sure the Jarl will be quite pleased to. I think it only fitting that the Arch-Mage personally receive a large portion of the reward.

name: The Raid
objective: help Laila Law-Giver to uncover and stop the illegal Skooma trade in Riften
first_tasks: convince Sarthis close down his Skooma operation permanently

quest_giver.name: Laila Law-Giver
quest_giver.description: the lawful female ruler of Riften

tools: Laila Law-Giver gives the player the key to the warehouse
description:
We're aware of a Skooma dealer's presence in the warehouse within this city. Unfortunately, we're certain this Skooma dealer, Sarthis, has informants within the city guard. Every time we've made a move to arrest him, he's escaped.
However, if you'd take care of this discreetly, you might be able to surprise him without warning. Here, this is the key to the warehouse. See if you can drop in on this dealer of poison and convince him to close down his operation permanently.

name: Served Cold
objective: search Raven Rock and root out traitors who want to assassinate Councilor Morvayn
first_tasks: talk to Geldis Sadri and check out any leads he provides you

quest_giver.name: Adril Arano
quest_giver.description: the second councilor of Raven Rock, and a loyal underling of Councilor Morvayn

characters.name: Councilor Morvayn
characters.description: the nobleman who rules over Raven Rock, a member of House Redoran

groups.name: House Hlaalu
groups.description: a dishonorable great house, rivals of House Redoran

groups.name: Ulen Family
groups.description: a family belonging to House Hlaalu

tools: the player has helped Raven Rock before
the Ulen Family has placed a deathmark on Councilor Morvayn's head
description:
After everything you've already done for Raven Rock, I hate to ask for more but I can't risk Councilor Morvayn being killed.
The Ulen Family of House Hlaalu, a rival Great House, has placed a deathmark on the Councilor's head. I need you to start out by being my eyes and ears... search Raven Rock and see if you can root out these traitors.
The best place to start would be Geldis Sadri over at the Retching Netch Cornerclub. If he provides you any leads, check them out before bringing them to my attention. I can't afford to make any mistakes.

name: Mourning Never Comes
objective: assassinate an ex-lover for Muiri
first_tasks: speak with Muiri, set up the contract with her, and fulfill it

quest_giver.name: Astrid
quest_giver.description: the player's guildleader in the Dark Brotherhood

reward.description: Astrid will let the player keep whatever Muiri pays, as this is the player's first assassination contract

items.name: Black Sacrament
items.description: a ritual to employ the services of the Dark Brotherhood

tools: Muiri has performed the Black Sacrament
do whatever Muiri wishes, be professional, represent the Dark Brotherhood well, and get the job done
description:
Ah, there you are. We've got some business to discuss.
You must go to the city of Markarth, and speak with the apothecary's assistant. You'll probably find her in the shop, The Hag's Cure. The girl's been running her mouth, wants an ex-lover killed. She's apparently performed the Black Sacrament. Her name is Muiri. I need you to talk to her, set up the contract, and carry it out.
Just do whatever the contact wishes. Be professional, represent us well, and get the job done. Since it's your first contract, I'll let you keep whatever Muiri pays. She'll be generous, I'm sure. They always are.

name: It's All in the Taste
objective: spread the word about Geldis Sadri's new Sujamma
first_tasks: distribute 10 Sadri's Sujamma to people
tools: NONE
description:
The house specialty is the finest Sujamma to cross your lips, friend. My own personal formula that I call 'Sadri's Sujamma'.
In fact, I've just added some new ingredients to the mixture that I think makes it taste better than ever. All I need to do is get the word out that it's ready and they'll flock here for it.
Here, take these ten samples of the Sujamma and spread the word. If you get rid of all of them, there's something extra in it for you.

name: Storm over Whiterun
objective: take Whiterun in the name of the Stormcloaks
first_tasks: tear through the barricades, and find a way to drop the drawbridge into Whiterun

first_task_locations.name: Whiterun
first_task_locations.description: a city with tall, yet old and crumbling walls

quest_giver.name: Galmar Stone-Fist
quest_giver.description: the player's commanding officer in the Stormcloaks, a Nord

groups.name: Stormcloaks
groups.description: Nord rebel forces opposing the Empire

tools: Galmar Stone-Fist is addressing the player and the player's fellow Stormcloaks: the true sons and daughters of Skyrim
Imperial legionnaires have been stationed on the walls of Whiterun
description:
This is it men! They say that our cause is false and that we are nothing more than thieves, thugs and murderers! But no! We are farmers! We are craftsmen! We are sons and daughters of shopkeepers, maid servants and soldiers!
We are the sons and daughters of Skyrim! And we have come this far because our cause is true. Because we fight as one. And because our hearts are bursting with anger! What we do here today, we do for our country! For all the true Nords of Skyrim!
Whiterun's walls are tall, but they are old and crumbling, like the Empire whose Legion lines them. They've barricades to block us, but we'll tear through them and the Imperials behind them! Our objective is the drawbridge. If we can find a way to drop it, the city will be ours!
Everyone on me. Let's show these Imperial milk drinkers what true Nords look like! Rrrrraaaaaarrrrr!!!!!

name: Last Goodbyes
objective: take Bera's necklace to Runil, and return to Morwen
first_tasks: give Bera's necklace to Runil and tell him that Morwen sent you

quest_giver.name: Morwen
quest_giver.description: a Skaal woman born in Skyrim

reward.description: Morwen will do what she can

groups.name: Skaal
groups.description: a friendly tribe of people living on a cold, remote island

tools: Bera left the Skaal village to return to Skyrim with her love: Morwen's father, a sailor from Skyrim
Morwen thinks that Bera would like her necklace be placed upon her grave in Falkreath
description:
My mother, Bera, was Skaal, but she left the village and I was born in Skyrim. A trade ship from Skyrim struck ice off the coast near the village, and the Skaal took in the surviving sailors. My mother fell in love with one of the sailors - my father - and eventually returned with him to Skyrim.
I came across a few of my mother's old things not long ago. Among them was a necklace that my father gave to her when they were married. I believe she would want it placed upon her tombstone in Falkreath, as a symbol of her undying love and the great sacrifice she made for it.
If you find yourself in Falkreath, please give this amulet to the priest Runil and tell him that I sent you. He will understand. I don't have much to give in reward, but return to me when the task is done and I'll do what I can. Thank you, Skaal-friend.

name: Purity of Revenge
objective: avenge Kodlak
first_tasks: retrieve the fragments of Wuuthrad and wipe out the Silver Hand

first_task_locations.name: Driftshade Refuge
first_task_locations.description: the headquarters of the Silver Hand

quest_giver.name: Vilkas
quest_giver.description: a fellow member of the Companions

characters.name: Kodlak
characters.description: an old man, and the leader of the Companions

groups.name: Silver Hand
groups.description: a bandit gang who hate the Companions

locations.name: Jorrvaskr
locations.description: the mead hall of the Companions

tools: the Silver Hand attacked the Companions in Jorrvaskr, killed Kodlak, and stole the fragments of Wuuthrad
description:
The Silver Hand attacked us. They finally found enough courage to attack Jorrvaskr. We fought them off, but... The old man... Kodlak... he's dead.
No one else got hurt, but they made off with all our fragments of Wuuthrad. But you and I are going to reclaim them. We will bring the battle to their chief camp, Driftshade Refuge. There will be none left living to tell their stories. Only songs of Jorrvaskr will be sung.
We will avenge Kodlak. And they will know terror before the end.

name: Flight or Fight
objective: tell Liefnarr that he is not welcome home
first_tasks: find Liefnarr

first_task_locations.name: Broken Helm Hollow
first_task_locations.description: a camp east towards the border of Morrowind

tools: Liefnarr went to trade some grain with people at Broken Helm Hollow: he never came back
description:
My husband Liefnarr said he was going east towards the border of Morrowind to trade some of our grain to some folks at Broken Helm Hollow.
I waited and waited, and he never came back. Probably shacked up with some elven whore. Good riddance to him I say. If I only knew where he was, I'd sure give him a piece of my mind.
If you see him, tell him Grosta said he can go straight to hell... he's not welcome here any more.

name: The Numbers Job
objective: make the shortfalls from Thieves Guild's other jobs look legit
first_tasks: change the numbers in the business ledger

quest_giver.name: Delvin Mallory
quest_giver.description: the player's superior in the Thieves Guild

tools: most businesses in Skyrim keep their transactions recorded within business ledgers
description:
Most of the establishments in Skyrim keep their transactions recorded within business ledgers.
Your job would be to change the numbers in those books so the shortfalls from our other jobs look legit. In this case, we want to waylay a shipment on the way from this business without them even noticin' anything went missin'.
Feel like doing a bit of writin' in Bits and Pieces in Solitude?

name: Hunt and Gather
objective: retrieve Wylandriah's Dwemer Spoon, Orichalcum Ingot, and Grand Soul Gem
first_tasks: fetch Dwemer Spoon
fetch Orichalcum Ingot
fetch Grand Soul Gem
tools: NONE
description:
I could use some help with getting organized. An assistant perhaps? No, no, no. Maybe a familiar. No, too messy. Well, at any rate, organization is not my strong suit. Not at all. I need as much help as I can get.
In fact, if you could retrieve a few things for me, I could start on my next set of experiments. What I need is my Dwemer Spoon, my Orichalcum Ingot and my Grand Soul Gem. In fact, I could use them immediately.
Well... why are you still standing here? Oh, right. You need to know where they are! That would help. Let's see. Last time I used the Dwemer Spoon was at my dear friend Boti's house in Ivarstead... Fellstar Farm I believe it's called. The Orichalcum Ingot should still be in Winterhold at the Frozen Hearth Inn. I don't know why I didn't just take it with me. And last is the gem. I left that one in Windhelm at the White Phial alchemy shop. It was a good trade too. Ah well.
Bring those items back to me and I'll be happy to experiment on you. No, no... that isn't right. I'd be happy to reward you.

name: Promises to Keep
objective: help Louis Letrush get Frost and his lineage papers from Sibbi Black-Briar
first_tasks: talk to Sibbi Black-Briar about Frost and the lineage papers

characters.name: Frost
characters.description: one of the finest breeding horses in the realm

characters.name: Maven Black-Briar
characters.description: Sibbi Black-Briar's mother, and a dangerous, powerful woman

tools: Sibbi Black-Briar agreed to sell Frost to Louis Letrush
Maven Black-Briar threw Sibbi Black-Briar in Riften Jail before he delivered Frost to Louis Letrush: Sibbi Black-Briar thinks that this exempts him from selling Frost to Louis Letrush
description:
I'm Louis Letrush. Looking for work? I need someone to deliver a message to Sibbi Black-Briar.
I recently approached Sibbi Black-Briar about buying Frost, one of the finest breeding horses in the realm. He agreed to sell. I paid Sibbi half the cost of Frost up front, but before he could deliver, Maven had him locked up. Sibbi believes this exempts him from our deal. It does not.
Head to the Riften Jail and talk to Sibbi. Get him to tell you where Frost and his Lineage Papers are and bring them to me outside Riften. You'll be well paid for your time.

name: A Tab to Pay
objective: convince Ranmir pay his debts to Haran
first_tasks: talk to Ranmir
tools: NONE
description:
Ranmir owes this tavern enough coin to burn it down, build it back up, then burn it down again just for laughs.
He's had some troubles in his life, but I can't have him drinking here without at least paying back some of the coin he owes.
Go right ahead and talk to him. He just might be sober enough to listen to you.

name: The Cure for Madness
objective: confront Cicero and kill him
first_tasks: find Arnbjorn and make sure he is alright
search Cicero's room for clues about where he has gone and let Astrid know about your findings

first_task_locations.description: Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary, the hideout of the Dark Brotherhood

quest_giver.name: Astrid
quest_giver.description: the player's guildmaster in the Dark Brotherhood

reward.description: Astrid lets the player take Shadowmere, when the player goes to find Arnbjorn

characters.name: Cicero
characters.description: a fellow member of the Dark Brotherhood, a dangerous madman

characters.name: Night Mother
characters.description: the spiritual female leader of the Dark Brotherhood

characters.name: Veezara
characters.description: a fellow member of the Dark Brotherhood, a man

characters.name: Arnbjorn
characters.description: a fellow member of the Dark Brotherhood, a man

tools: the player is the Listener of the Dark Brotherhood
Cicero went berserk because he overheard Astrid complain about the Night Mother and the player being the listener: Cicero wounded Veezara and tried to kill Astrid before fleeing
description:
The fool Cicero went absolutely berserk! He wounded Veezara, tried to kill me, and then he fled. I knew that lunatic couldn't be trusted.
Nothing set Cicero off. At least nothing I'm aware of. Well... If I'm being honest, I haven't exactly been discreet lately in expressing my frustration with this whole situation. Obeying the Night Mother. You being the Listener. It's ridiculous. No offense. Cicero may have overheard me talking to one of the others about the Night Mother. It's possible I was... not entirely respectful. But to go this far. To attempt to murder the leader of a Sanctuary. Cicero must pay with his life. There is no other option.
I want you to find that miserable little fool and end his life! But first... find my husband. Make sure he's all right. After the attack, Arnbjorn flew into a rage. When Cicero left... Arnbjorn went after him. They disappeared into the wild. Take my horse, Shadowmere. You'll find him outside, by the pool, when you go find Arnbjorn. Search Cicero's room here. Maybe there's something in there that sheds some light on where he might have gone.
Let me know the minute you find something. I've got to see to Veezara, and calm everyone down.

name: Hail Sithis!
objective: assassinate Titus Mede II
first_tasks: get onboard

first_task_locations.name: Katariah
first_task_locations.description: Titus Mede II's ship, moored offshore in the Solitude inlet

quest_giver.name: Amaund Motierre
quest_giver.description: a man who has contracted the Dark Brotherhood to kill Titus Mede II

reward.description: Amaund Motierre will reveal the location of the dead drop that holds the player's payment

tools: the player is a member of the Dark Brotherhood
Titus Mede II will be surrounded by elite bodyguards, but they might be more lax than usual because everyone assumes that the Dark Brotherhood has been destroyed
description:
The Emperor is still in Skyrim, but not for long. He's onboard his ship, the Katariah, moored offshore in the Solitude inlet. But you must hurry!
If you can get onboard that ship. Kill Titus Mede II, as contracted... I will reveal the location of the dead drop that holds your payment.
This is the true Emperor, not some half-penny lookalike. He'll be surrounded by elite bodyguards, I'm sure. You'll have your work cut out for you. Still... everyone assumes the Dark Brotherhood has been completely destroyed. They may be a bit more lax than usual.

name: Unwanted Tenants
objective: kill a beast for Pavo Attius
first_tasks: kill the beast

quest_giver.name: Aela the Huntress
quest_giver.description: a fellow member of the Companions

tools: NONE
description:
Pavo Attius has asked for our help. It seems a predator has invaded his home, and someone needs to clear the beast out.
Be cautious. Beasts are not nearly as predictable as men. Give the thing a quick death.

name: Healing a House
objective: help Elynea Mothren to repair Neloth's tower
first_tasks: find 3 taproots, soak them in the headwaters of Harstrad, and bring them to Elynea Mothren

quest_giver.name: Elynea Mothren
quest_giver.description: Neloth's mycologist, and an old woman

tools: NONE
description:
I don't care if he's a master wizard. He can't treat me like this! Master Neloth, that fetcher, told me to fix his house. If I don't, he'll find a new mycologist who will. Decades of loyal service, and he'd just throw me out like yesterday's breakfast!
I need three taproots soaked in the headwaters of the Harstrad river to fix Neloth's tower. I'm an old woman. I can't possibly make that trip. It's way too dangerous.
If you get some taproots, I'll pay you to dip them in the headwaters and bring them to me.

name: The Blessings of Nature
objective: restore the Gildergreen with the sap of the Eldergleam
first_tasks: get Nettlebane

items.name: Gildergreen
items.description: the big holy tree of Kynareth that died

items.name: Eldergleam
items.description: the ancient parent tree of the Gildergreen

items.name: Nettlebane
items.description: a weapon that can cut the Eldergleam

tools: disciples of Kynareth used to travel far to hear the winds of Kynareth in the Gildergreen's branches
description:
This is the Gildergreen. It was planted as a seedling in the early years of Whiterun. Disciples of Kynareth could sense something holy in it, and traveled far to hear the winds of the goddess in its branches. Of course, not as many pilgrims these days. A big dead tree isn't very inspiring if you're coming to worship the divine of wind and rains. Kynareth gives life, and we need a living tree to be her symbol.
I've thought about restoring the Gildergreen... Trees like this never really die. They only slumber. I think if we had some of the sap from the parent tree, Eldergleam, we could wake up its child. But even if you could get to the Eldergleam, you couldn't tap it. Not with any normal metal. If you want to help, you'll need something to cut into it first.
Eldergleam is older than metal, from a time before men or elves. To even affect it, you have to tap into the old magic. You'll have to deal with the Hagravens. I've heard about a weapon they've made for sacrificing Kynareth's creations. It's called "Nettlebane." The hags terrify me, or I would have gone after it myself. It's held in a Hagraven nest called Orphan Rock

name: Judgment
objective: destroy Harkon
first_tasks: meet up with Isran and the rest of your Dawnguard allies

first_task_locations.name: Castle Volkihar
first_task_locations.description: a castle belonging to Harkon in Tamriel

quest_giver.name: Isran
quest_giver.description: the player's leader in the Dawnguard

tools: Isran will address the player's fellow Dawnguard members before leaving for Castle Volkihar: the Dawnguard has gained the upper hand in the fight against the vampires
description:
The day hasn't been won while the vampire Harkon still walks Tamriel.
Let me address the Dawnguard, and then we'll be off. The men deserve to know that we've finally gained the upper hand. It's time we take the fight to their door.
Gather your things and rest well, my friend. We meet outside Castle Volkihar.

name: Recipe for Disaster
objective: kill the Gourmet, steal his writ of passage, and assume his identity
first_tasks: talk to Festus

quest_giver.name: Astrid
quest_giver.description: the player's guildleader in the Dark Brotherhood

characters.name: Gourmet
characters.description: a famous master chef, whose true identity is not known

characters.name: Festus
characters.description: a fellow Dark Brotherhood member, a man

tools: the Gourmet is the last target before he Dark Brotherhood strikes out at the emperor: the Gourmet is scheduled to cook for the emperor at a special dinner
Festus is close to uncovering the identity of the Gourmet
description:
There's just one more target before we strike out at the Emperor.
Have you by chance heard of the "Gourmet"? Read his cookbook? It's become quite a phenomenon. The Gourmet is scheduled to cook for the Emperor at a special dinner.
You'll kill him, steal his Writ of Passage, and assume the role of master chef. Festus has been spearheading this part of the assassination plan. He's close to uncovering the identity of the Gourmet.
You should report to him.

name: The Silence Has Been Broken
objective: accept Amaund Motierre's assassination contract
first_tasks: take the sealed letter and the valuable amulet to your superior in the Dark Brotherhood

items.name: Black Sacrament
items.description: a dark ritual to obtain the services of the Dark Brotherhood

tools: the player, a member of the Dark Brotherhood, came to see Amaund Motierre after he had performed the Black Sacrament
Amaund Motierre wants to arrange several assassination contracts with the Dark Brotherhood, leading to the assassination of the emperor
Amaund Motierre gives the player two items: a sealed letter that will explain everything that needs to be done, and a valuable amulet - the player can use it to pay for any and all expenses
description:
By the almighty Divines. You've come. You've actually come. This dreadful Black Sacrament thing... it worked.
Well, I won't waste your time. I would like to arrange a contract. Several, actually. I daresay, the work I'm offering has more significance than anything your organization has experienced in, well, centuries.
As I said, I want you to kill several people. You'll find the targets, as well as their manners of elimination, quite varied. I'm sure someone of your disposition will probably even find it enjoyable. But you should know that these killings are but a means to an end. For they pave the way to the most important target. The real reason I'm speaking with a cutthroat in the bowels of this detestable crypt. For I seek the assassination of... ...the Emperor.
What I ask is no small thing, of course. But you represent the Dark Brotherhood. This is... what you do? No? You must understand. So much has led to this day. So much planning, and maneuvering. Now, it's as if the very stars have finally aligned. But I digress. Here, take these two items. They need to be delivered to your, um... superior. The sealed letter will explain everything that needs to be done. The amulet is quite valuable - you can use it to pay for any and all expenses.

name: The Lure of of the World
objective: convince Nikulas to stay with his mother
first_tasks: counsel Nikulas on the perils of the world

characters.name: Nikulas
characters.description: Edla's son, strong and loyal, yet reckless and foolish

tools: Edla recently lost her husband: Nikulas is everything she has left
description:
I'm Edla. I have a son. His name is Nikulas. He's a good lad, strong and loyal. I only wish he wasn't so eager to leave the village. I've tried to tell him that the world beyond our lands is dangerous and cruel, but he won't listen.
For now, I need Nikulas here. You see, his father, my husband, was recently lost to us. Nikulas is all that I have left in this world. I know it is selfish of me to say so, but I cannot lose him. Not while I still grieve. Also, I know his heart. Nikulas is reckless and foolish, like most young men. He cannot understand what awaits him in the wide world.
Could you talk to Nikulas? I know he would listen to you. You've been out there in the wide world. You know its perils.

name: Artifice of Evil
objective: save the Guardian of Mana, and Zeryphesh
first_tasks: find the Guardian of Mana

first_task_locations.name: Vaults Forsaken
first_task_locations.description: a foul dungeon filled with Ezrohir

quest_giver.name: Sphinx
quest_giver.description: a statue that speaks in riddles

groups.name: Ezrohir
groups.description: a race of people who are at war with Zeryphesh

tools: the Ezrohir captured the Guardian of Mana again: they stripped away her magic and enslaved her
description:
The Ezrohir prepare today for war
Their legions number in the score.
Their Alchemy and Artifice suffice
To capture Mana... not once but twice.
Imprisoned in the Vaults Forsaken:
Subdued, enslaved, her magic taken.
Forced to lead their troops in battle
From Guardian... to so much chattel.
The Ezrohir have Mana enslaved
But there's still hope; she might yet be saved.
The enemy lie in this foul creche.
Save the Guardian... save Zeryphesh.

name: Meet the Djinni
objective: convince Fazeer Shah to help you
first_tasks: locate Fazeer Shah
tools: Fazeer Shah and Ezrek Khan went to war centuries ago: they damaged the cities and devastated the land; Zeraphi sultan had enough and banished them both
description:
Centuries ago, a djinni named Fazeer Shah and a djinni named Ezrek Khan quarreled over some trivial matter, and ultimately went to war. They caused considerable damage to the cities, and devastated the land, until the Zeraphi sultan had had enough. He banished them both: one to the desert, and one to... another place; a dark realm.
If you can reach Fazeer Shah, you might be able to convince him to help us.
You must travel out into the Salt Barrens to locate Fazeer Shah.

name: Bring Out Your Dead
objective: recover the Rosamortis for Selrenki
first_tasks: convince the spirits to unlock the Ghost Chains
get the Rosamortis away from its big undead guardian

first_task_locations.name: Bone Gallery
first_task_locations.description: a crypt whose entrance is locked with the Ghost Chains

reward.description: Selrenki makes it worth the player's while

items.name: Ghost Chains
items.description: chains that only a ghost can open

items.name: Rosamortis
items.description: a valuable little item that can save the life of someone who's been mortally wounded

tools: NONE
description:
I got a proposition for you... a little "I scratch my back, you scratch yours" kind of thing. See this crypt over here? It's called the Bone Gallery, and there's a little thing in there called the Rosamortis... a handy little thingamajig that can save the life of someone who's been mortally wounded... which, while pretty valuable, is also guarded by the biggest undead monstrosity I've ever seen!
Also, the entrance to the Bone Gallery is locked with chains only a ghost can open! You'll have to convince the spirits to unlock the Ghost Chains and give you access, then get the Rosamortis away from that monster... but I promise to make it worth your while!

name: One Man's Trash
objective: find out whether a used Ember can be recharged, and return to Nerasis
first_tasks: attempt to charge the Spent Ember

first_task_locations.name: Tarroch's Rift
first_task_locations.description: a mana-rich area with horrible monsters

quest_giver.name: Nerasis
quest_giver.description: a a researcher working for the Empire

tools: NONE
description:
Hello there! I wonder if you have a moment to help me out? My name is Nerasis; I'm a researcher for the Empire. I've been working on a theory that used Ember can be recharged, with exposure to a suitably large source of mana. My research led me to Tarroch's Rift, where the mana output ratio is... well, it's very high.
The problem is that there are quite a few horrible monsters between me and the mana source. I would be willing to pay you to take this burned-out Spent Ember into Tarroch's Rift and attempt to charge it, then bring it back here so I can see if my theory is correct.

name: Tower of the Moon
objective: see if there are Ezrohir scouts at the Tower of the Moon
first_tasks: deal with any Ezrohir scouts you find

first_task_locations.name: Tower of the Moon
first_task_locations.description: an ancient tower in the Ossean Wastes, near Zeryphesh

locations.name: Zeryphesh
locations.description: a city-state located in the Ossean Wastes

locations.name: Forsaken Vaults
locations.description: a dungeon located far out in the Ossean Wastes

groups.name: Ezrohir
groups.description: a race of people who are at war with Zeryphesh

tools: NONE
description:
My friend, I have a mission for you. You may have noticed the Ezrohir activity in the Ossean Wastes. We believe these are scouts operating out of the Forsaken Vaults, but they are appearing so close to the city gates that we think they might have a base much nearer, from which they are spying on us.
We have narrowed down the possibilities, and I want you to look into the Tower of the Moon, an ancient tower jutting from the Ossean Wastes. Determine if there are any Ezrohir scouts there... and if you find any, deal with them.

name: Grom's Arena
objective: prove your worth to Grom
first_tasks: attempt to survive the Arena of Slaughter
tools: many have tried to survive the Arena of Slaughter: now their souls serve Grom
description:
So... you come seeking the wealth of Grom? My spoils are vast, and have no peer in this realm.
There is no path to success for you, lest you survive my arena and prove your worth.
Be forewarned - many have tested their mettle on this bloodstained floor, but none have yet succeeded. Their souls are now mine, and they do as they are bid.
Will you attempt the challenge? I will await your decision.
None have yet triumphed within the walls of my arena.
Perhaps you will be the first?
Perhaps...

name: The Warbeast Armory
objective: steal the armor schematics
first_tasks: get inside the Sturmbeorn makeshift smithy
tools: two Sturmbeorn blacksmiths are making suits of armor for Warbeasts
description:
If you're going out to the Temple Steppes, I could use your help. The Sturmbeorn have set up a makeshift smithy there, and they have two blacksmiths making suits of armor for wild Warbeasts they've captured.
Those Sturmbeorn seem to be working from schematics, but they keep them under lock and key. Do you think you might be able to get in there and grab the armor schematics?

name: The Locket
objective: kill the Wraith Lord and find Estherian Spectre's remains along the Locket
first_tasks: find the Sanguine Gems
place the Sanguine Gems on the altars to open the path to the Wraith Lord

first_task_locations.description: the depths beyond the Rotting Crypt

quest_giver.name: Estherian Spectre
quest_giver.description: a ghost of a man who is bound to the Rotting Crypt
quest_giver.location: near the altars in the Rotting Crypt

tools: NONE
description:
I am bound to this place, and may not pass beyond the threshold. 
If you seek my remains, you must find the Sanguine Gems - they may be found in the depths beyond. Place them upon these altars, and the path to the Wraith Lord will be revealed.
If you can best him, you will discover my remains there - and the Locket Jessa seeks.

name: Bounty: Warbeasts!
objective: help colonists by thinning out packs of Warbeasts
first_tasks: kill 10 Warbeasts

quest_giver.name: Commander Vale
quest_giver.description: the leader of the Vanquisher Corps, giving quest via "Bounty Board"

tools: NONE
description:
BOUNTY!
Commander Vale of the Vanquisher Corps is offering a reward to anyone who can help thin out the packs of Warbeasts hampering colonization and defense efforts in Estheria.
This reward shall be paid to anyone who slays 10 or more Warbeasts in the Temple Steppes.

name: Onward to Zeryphesh!
objective: travel to Zeryphesh on the Imperial Railmaster's Embercraft
first_tasks: tell the Imperial Railmaster when your ready to go

locations.name: Zeryphesh
locations.description: a town a couple of days travel away from here

tools: the Vanquisher told the Imperial Railmaster that the player is coming to him
description: You're the one the Vanquisher lady told me about, then? Alright... whenever you're ready to get rollin', we'll get your gear aboard our Embercraft, and we'll set out to Zeryphesh. Shouldn't take us more than a couple of days to get there!

name: The Scroll of Anom-Irek
objective: retrieve the Scroll of Anom-Irek, and return to Miamin
first_tasks: find the Scroll of Anom-Irek in a vault

first_task_locations.name: Corrupted Crypt
first_task_locations.description: a crypt crawling with the Sturmbeorn in the Path of the Honored Dead

tools: the player has helped Estherians before
description:
You must be the human the other Estherians are speaking of. I am glad to have met you. I have been sent on a quest to recover the Scroll of Anom-Irek, stored in a vault in the Corrupted Crypt, here. The scroll should allow us to heal the Estherians who have been corrupted by evil spirits. Unfortunately, the Sturmbeorn have already entered the crypt, and I have been unable to get past them.
Can I ask you to attempt to retrieve the scroll? I will wait here in the Path of the Honored Dead for your return. Should you succeed, I will see what I can do to provide you with some equipment more fitting a hero of your stature.

name: Perilous Passage
objective: save the Mana Queen
first_tasks: go through the gate to the Forsaken Vaults

quest_giver.name: Sphinx
quest_giver.description: the guardian of the Forsaken Vaults, speaks in rhymes
quest_giver.location: the gate to the Forsaken Vaults

tools: NONE
description:
The Mana Queen has come and gone
Through this gate, she journeyed on.
Follow her and pay the cost.
Hasten forth, or she'll be lost.
